page.title: 17ALVERSTOKE
page.content: Most of the housing in Alverstoke village is old and some are "listed buildings". In the village centre most of the accomodation is above the shops. Elderly people like to live in the real village because it is quiet and the shops so old-fashioned and neat. There are about 15 shops altogether,including food shops, an antique shop,post office and bank. Although Alverstoke is a suburb of Gosport,the residents like to think of it as a separate place. Almost all the residents of Alverstoke work in either Gosport,Fareham or Portsmouth. Being an old village,the streets were not designed to carry much traffic and the roads are often congested.
